## Setup and Model Fitting

```{r setup}
library(parameters)
library(effectsize)
library(insight)
library(see)
library(glmmTMB)
library(lavaan)
library(ggplot2)
data("Salamanders")

theme_set(theme_modern())
```

```{r}
# fit example model
model <- glmmTMB(
  count ~ spp + mined + (1 | site),
  ziformula =  ~ mined,
  family = poisson(),
  data = Salamanders
)

model_parameters(model)
```

## Model Parameters

```{r}
result <- model_parameters(model)

plot(result)
```

## Simulated Model Parameters

```{r}
result <- parameters_simulate(model)

plot(result)
```

```{r}
plot(result, stack = FALSE)
```

```{r}
plot(result, grid = TRUE)
```

```{r}
plot(result, grid = TRUE, stack = FALSE)
```

## Model Parameters of SEM models

```{r}
structure <- ' visual  =~ x1 + x2 + x3
               textual =~ x4 + x5 + x6
               speed   =~ x7 + x8 + x9 '

model <- lavaan::cfa(structure, data = HolzingerSwineford1939)
result <- parameters::model_parameters(model)
plot(result)
```

## Principal Component Analysis

```{r}
data(mtcars)
result <- principal_components(mtcars[, 1:7], n = "all", threshold = 0.2)
result

plot(result)
```

```{r}
result <- principal_components(
  mtcars[, 1:7], 
  n = 3, 
  rotation = "varimax", 
  threshold = "max", 
  sort = TRUE
)

result

plot(result, type = "line", text_color = "white") +
  theme_abyss()
```

## Number of Components/Factors to Retain

```{r}
data(mtcars)
result <- n_factors(mtcars, type = "PCA")
result

plot(result)
plot(result, type = "line")
```

## Number of Clusters to Retain

```{r}
data(iris)
result <- n_clusters(standardize(iris[, 1:4]))
result

plot(result)
plot(result, type = "line")
```
